title: WaterCrawl
description:
WaterCrawl 🕷️ is a powerful, AI-friendly web crawling and content extraction platform that helps you turn websites into structured, usable knowledge. Whether you're building datasets for LLMs, researching competitors, or documenting online content, WaterCrawl makes it easy to discover, extract, and organize data in clean Markdown format. 

🌐 Smart Website Crawler
🧠 LLM-Ready Export
⚡ Fast & Scalable
🔌 AI Tool Integration
🚀 Self-hosted or Cloud

Powered by Django, Scrapy, Celery, Playwright
